Book Your Room Now!!Simple Introduction of EgyptEgypt, officially the Arab Republic of Egypt, is a transcontinental country spanning the northeast corner of Africa and southwest corner of Asia via a land bridge formed by the Sinai Peninsula. Egypt is one of the most populous countries in Africa and the Middle East. Egypt has one of the longest histories of any modern state, having been continuously inhabited since the 10th millennium BC.
